definition: to play with/to toy with/to dally with/to engage in/to resort to
to play/to have fun/to trifle with/toy/sth used for amusement/curio or antique (Taiwan pr. [wan4])/to keep sth for entertainment
variant of 玩[wan2]/Taiwan pr. [wan4]
lane/alley
to do/to manage/to handle/to play with/to fool with/to mess with/to fix/to toy with
variant of 弄[long4]
old variant of 弄[nong4]
to juggle with words (dishonestly)/to be a hypocrite and hide behind florid rhetoric

sentences.english: Lester ruminated for a while, toying with his fork.
sentences.chinese: 雷斯脱手里拿一把叉玩弄着沉吟了半晌。

sentences.english: While she spoke she turned a silver bracelet round and round her wrist.
sentences.chinese: 她说话时不停地玩弄着手腕上的银镯。

sentences.english: Don't trifle with the girl's affections.
sentences.chinese: 不要玩弄那个女孩的感情。

sentences.english: Why are you toying with these weird old men?
sentences.chinese: 为什么要玩弄这些怪蜀黍呢？

sentences.english: Aileen toyed aimlessly with her fan .
sentences.chinese: 爱玲漫不经心地玩弄着扇子。

sentences.english: I've heard they toyed with the idea of saying You're a Hag .
sentences.chinese: 我听过他们玩弄这样的主意，你是个女巫。

sentences.english: It is wrong for a man to play with a woman's affections.
sentences.chinese: 男人玩弄女人的情感是不对的。

sentences.english: They cunningly played the game of sham peace.
sentences.chinese: 他们狡滑地玩弄假和平的把戏。

sentences.english: The art is a tragedy if the art plays tricks on the sensations with its development.
sentences.chinese: 如果艺术发展到玩弄感觉的程度，那则是艺术的悲哀。
超级大国正在玩弄强权政治。

sentences.english: By playing the good global citizen, Europe aims to become the world's pacesetter.
sentences.chinese: 通过玩弄全球善良的公民，欧洲试图成为世界的标兵。

sentences.english: Usually, they are the result of statistical legerdemain.
sentences.chinese: 而且他们往往是通过在统计数据方面玩弄把戏产生的。

sentences.english: So Mr Zuma will have less money to play with.
sentences.chinese: 因此，祖马今后可以玩弄的钱财资本将是越来越少。

sentences.english: He'll fiddle with his socks and pull them up.
sentences.chinese: 他会玩弄他的袜子，并将其往上拉。

sentences.english: Xia is painful be determined, dallied with emotive cheater to part company with this.
sentences.chinese: 阿霞痛下决心，与这个玩弄感情的骗子分手了。

definition: to play with/to engage in/to resort to/to dally with
to play tricks on/to make fun of/to tease
(have sb in) the palm of one's hand/fig. (under) one's complete control
to make a fool out of/to fool/to dupe
to arrange/to order about/to manipulate
to reckon/to calculate/to plan/to expect/to scheme
to tease/to play tricks on
to tease
crafty plots and machinations (idiom)
to maltreat/to tyrannize
to ravage/to devastate/to trample on/to violate
to deceive/to cheat
to amuse oneself/to play with/to tease
to kill (or assault) sadistically
to produce clouds with one turn of the hand and rain with another (idiom); fig. to shift one's ground/tricky and inconstant/to make love
acrobatics/jugglery/cheap trick/game
